hero.title: Biofiller London
hero.subtitle: Cutting-Edge Autologous Plasma Therapy in Knightsbridge
hero.description: Experience the future of facial rejuvenation with biofiller at Beyond Aesthetics London. Our state-of-the-art Knightsbridge clinic offers autologous plasma therapy for natural volume restoration and comprehensive skin regeneration.

treatmentInfo.duration: 60–90 minutes including blood collection and plasma processing
treatmentInfo.results: Immediate volumizing effect with continued skin regeneration over 4-8 weeks. Longevity of 12-18 months typical
treatmentInfo.price: From £500 per treatment zone - Contact for bespoke consultation

zhCN.title: 伦敦生物填充
zhCN.description: 在Beyond Aesthetics伦敦体验面部年轻化的未来。我们位于骑士桥的最先进诊所提供自体血浆疗法，用于自然容量恢复和全面皮肤再生。

zhTW.title: 倫敦生物填充
zhTW.description: 在Beyond Aesthetics倫敦體驗面部年輕化的未來。我們位於騎士橋的最先進診所提供自體血漿療法，用於自然容量恢復和全面皮膚再生。

ar.title: الحشو الحيوي في لندن
ar.description: اختبر مستقبل تجديد الوجه مع الحشو الحيوي في Beyond Aesthetics لندن. تقدم عيادتنا الحديثة في نايتسبريدج علاج البلازما الذاتية لاستعادة الحجم الطبيعي وتجديد البشرة الشامل.
